channel.title: [PI] Increase shop buy's [PI] Rep++
channel.description:
hey ppl, i always asked myself how i could increase this but never needed it. but now i need it
u know if u do rightmouse click to buy runes out of a shop u see value,1,5,10
i need to know how to change this cuz it sucks for my dungeoneering if u need to buy 2k water runes
i will rep++
